About UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant

UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant enables deployment of UCS Infrastructure through a guided workflow incorporating AS configuration best practices, primarily focused on green field deployments. The tool helps you to configure your UCS Server in few steps:

 • Setting the Infrastructure

 • Configuring the Admin

 • Setting up the Equipment

 • Configuring the LAN

 • Configuring the SAN

 • Setting up the Server

 • Configuring UCS Manager
